AERIALMINIBOSS: ((FIREBALL | SCREAM) + ANYDASH + (SIDESLASH | UPSLASH) | MILDCOMBATSKIPS + (FIREBALL | SCREAM) + (SIDESLASH | UPSLASH) | SPICYCOMBATSKIPS + (SIDESLASH | UPSLASH | CYCLONE | GREATSLASH)) + (CONSISTENTSPELLS | SPICYCOMBATSKIPS)
BOSSFLUKE: (FIREBALL>1 | SCREAM>1 | SPELLS>1 + MILDCOMBATSKIPS | CURSED + (FIREBALL | SCREAM)) + (CONSISTENTSPELLS | SPICYCOMBATSKIPS)
ALLBALDURS: (FIREBALL | QUAKE) + CONSISTENTSPELLS | GLOWINGWOMB | (WEAVERSONG | SPORESHROOM + FOCUS + CONSISTENTSPELLS) + OBSCURESKIPS | CYCLONE + DIFFICULTSKIPS
